text: Bullets Over Broadway is a 1994 American crime comedy movie. It is about Broadway theatre and the Mafia. This was released in October 1994 for the United States. Dianne Wiest plays Helen Sinclair, Jennifer Tilly plays Olive Neal and Mary-Louise Parker plays Ellen. This comedy is set in 1928. The director and co-writer of Bullets Over Broadway is Woody Allen. The reviews for this crime comedy were very positive. == Other websites == * Category:1994 comedy movies Category:1994 crime movies Category:1990s criminal comedy movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Mafia Category:Manhattan in fiction Category:Movies directed by Woody Allen Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:Screenplays by Woody Allen
title: Bullets Over Broadway
